content: There are still a few monster files around. The first one that comes to mind is data.finset.basic. How should we slash it?
I'm for removing the 150 lines or so about piecewise as it's not as used as the rest of the file and it's already well isolated.
card as well is pretty well delimited and does make sense as a file on its own.
I haven't looked at the file in a while, but I'm all for splitting it up further!
It just grows on its own :shrug: and I'm again about to feed the monster some more lemmas.
Do we already have group_theory.monster? That genuinely ought to be the only monster file in mathlib (_;
Maybe one more for the Tarski monster group
